title: The Sire #1
description: Donald Wright was a lowly assistant at a TV news company before a chance encounter with an alien energy force changed his life forever! Now he’s the SIRE, a superhero forced by his own costume to save the Earth from a technology mogul hell bent on seizing the costume's unimaginable power for himself! “Truly inspired, the SIRE is the result of pure excitement and magic on the part of its creators.” – Ethan Van Sciver "If heroics take a backseat to maninpulation, then convention takes a backseat to innovation in The Sire" - Wizard Magazine "The story is solid as Dolce makes the characters three-dimensional. this (is a) well done indy tale of a reluctant super-hero." - Comic Buyers Guide
author: Michael Dolce
